altername_name: Mario & Sonic en los Juegos Olímpicos London 2012
Mario & Sonic ai Giochi Olimpici di Londra 2012
Mario & Sonic bei den Olympischen Spielen London 2012
Mario & Sonic aux Jeux Olympiques de Londres 2012
Mario & Sonic op de Olympische Spelen Londen 2012
Mario y Sonic en los Juegos Olimpicos London 2012
name: Mario & Sonic at the London 2012 Olympic Games
overview: Featuring an exclusive Story Mode, the protagonists from the Mario and Sonic series team up to defeat Bowser and Dr. Eggman, who, along with their underlings, have taken over London. There are different parts to the story, depending on the character played. The player must win events against the antagonists. Playable characters consist of all 20 playable characters from the previous installment's Nintendo DS version, and are split into five groups of four.
